#summary configuration for Cibernate (ORM)

= cibernate.xml=
<font size="3" face="Georgia, Arial">
<cibernate>
	<config>
		<uid>DB user Name</uid>
		<pwd>DB user password</pwd>
		<dsn>Data Source Name</dsn>
		<pool-size>5</pool-size>
	</config>
	<tables>
		<table name="Table1 Name" class="Object1 Name">
			<col dbf="Table Column Name" obf="Object Property Name"></col>
			<col dbf="Table Column Name" obf="Object Property Name"></col>
                        <col dbf="Table Column Name" obf="Object Property Name"></col>
		</table>
		<table name="Table2 Name" class="Object2 Name">
			<col dbf="id" obf="id"></col>
			<col dbf="name" obf="name"></col>
		</table>
		<table name="Table3 Name" class="Object3 Name">
			<hasOne fk="id" pk="test_id">Test</hasOne>
			<col dbf="id" obf="id"></col>
			<col dbf="test_id" obf="test_id"></col>
		</table>
		<table name="Table4 Name" class="Object4 Name">
			<hasMany fk="id" pk="test_id" field="tests">Test</hasMany>
			<col dbf="id" obf="id"></col>
			<col dbf="test_id" obf="test_id"></col>
		</table>
	</tables>
</cibernate>
</font>
